main event: A sighting of a round object resembling a pea, white with a red ring on the edge, reported on February 2, 1956.
interesting points: The object was stationary during the observation,The object was described as the size of a pea,The source of the observation was civilian,The report suggests the object might be an airways beacon light,The observation occurred at 2205 PST under clear skies.
sighted object: round object size of a pea, white with a red ring on edge
